.. raw:: html

   <div style="text-align: center; font-size: 54px;">sphinx_tutorials</div>
   <div style="text-align: center; font-size: 22px; font-style: oblique;">Utilities to facilitate creating Tutorials with sphinx-immaterial</div>


Intro
-----

The :obj:`sphinx_tutorials` library is a Python 3 package that helps creating nicely formatted tutorials using sphinx and sphinx-immaterial.
